first time start up text Thanks for downloading Simple Weather! Please select how you want Simple Weather to get your location Use my current location No, I\'ll set my location
more information text More information Wind: Humidity: Dew point: Pressure: Location: Feels like: Precipitation in last 24 hrs: Visibility: Refresh \u2103 \u2109 Rate Open menu Settings %1$s from the %2$s %1$s from the %2$s, gusting to %3$s
error text No internet connection No weather information returned Data returned cannot be interpreted. It could be that the city you entered can\'t be found or the data returned is corrupted You must turn on your location before Simple Weather can continue Simple Weather needs permission to access location. Your current location is not stored and will only be used once when you first open the app to load the weather.
